<title level="1" pfs="">[Urnak Lostwind](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1506)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 42

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 14">[Urnak Lostwind](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1506)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 41</row>

**Perception** +25

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Orcish](/Languages.aspx?ID=9), [Skald](/Languages.aspx?ID=42)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +23, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +23, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +25

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +5

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21)_, _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 34 

**Fort** +27 

**Ref** +23 

**Will** +25 

</row>

**HP** 310

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> Urnak gets 1 extra reaction each turn that he can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greataxe_ +27 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 3d12+13 slashing plus 1d6 cold

**Brutally Disarm** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** Urnak is wielding a two-handed weapon in both hands; **Effect** Urnak attempts to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) a creature within reach. On a success or critical success, Urnak deals 13 damage of the weapon's type to the Disarmed creature. If he rolls a failure to Disarm, he gets a success instead.

**Felling Throw** <actions string="Single Action" />  Urnak makes a ranged Strike with his greataxe. He has a +25 attack modifier for this Strike and the thrown greataxe's range increment is 40 feet. If he damages a flying creature, it descends 120 feet, possibly falling on the ground.

**Ricochet Throw**   When Urnak uses Felling Throw, his greataxe bounces back to him at the end of the action and he can catch it as a free action. If he uses Felling Throw again before the end of his turn (even if it's not at the same target), the attack ignores all cover.

**Sweep Aside** <actions string="Single Action" />  Urnak makes a melee greataxe Strike. If he hits a creature of his size or smaller, he can [move](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) it 5 feet in any direction, or 10 feet on a critical hit.

</column>
name: Urnak Lostwind

On a success or critical success, Urnak deals 13 damage of the weapon's type to the Disarmed creature. If he rolls a failure to Disarm, he gets a success instead. Felling Throw Single Action Urnak makes a ranged Strike with his greataxe. He has a +25 attack modifier for this Strike and the thrown greataxe's range increment is 40 feet. If he damages a flying creature, it descends 120 feet, possibly falling on the ground. Ricochet Throw When Urnak uses Felling Throw, his greataxe bounces back to him at the end of the action and he can catch it as a free action. If he uses Felling Throw again before the end of his turn (even if it's not at the same target), the attack ignores all cover. Sweep Aside Single Action Urnak makes a melee greataxe Strike. If he hits a creature of his size or smaller, he can move it 5 feet in any direction, or 10 feet on a critical hit.
